bibl.title: A Fragment of the Great Doxology in the Bodleian Library.
bibl.note: Provenance unknown, seventh / eighth century. The fragment comes from the so-called δοξολογία μεγάλη or hymnus angelicus, printed in A. RAHLFS, Psalmi cum odis (1967) as Ode 14 ὕμνος ἑωθινός.
bibl.seg: GONIS Nikolaos, A Fragment of the Great Doxology in the Bodleian Library.
Provenance unknown, seventh / eighth century. The fragment comes from the so-called δοξολογία μεγάλη or hymnus angelicus, printed in A. RAHLFS, Psalmi cum odis (1967) as Ode 14 ὕμνος ἑωθινός.
